description:
Mitty used to be a human girl, but was transformed into a Hollow by ascending from the 6th layer of the Abyss. She lives with http://anidb.net/ch89866 [Nanachi].
Later on, Nanachi mentioned that Mitty and her were part of http://anidb.net/ch91600 [Bondrewd]`s experiments, where he sacrificed many children in order to find a way to counter the curse of the Abyss. As a result of the same experiment, all of children were transformed into mindless Hollows, while Nanachi`s transformation resulted with their humanity preserved.
name: Mitty
